title: Prickly Pear Margarita uses Casamigos Reposado Tequila and specific ingredients
statement: The Prickly Pear Margarita contains Casamigos Reposado Tequila, lime agave sour, prickly pear purée, and a Grand Marnier float.

citations.quote: Casamigos Reposado Tequila, lime agave sour and prickly pear purée; float of Grand Marnier
